extendedInfo.description: Reliable, on-demand local business info for the Lethbridge, Alberta area. ClearlyLethbridge takes the yellow pages a step further, with detailed business info, coupons, events, jobs, and more. Quickly find real local businesses listed on the highly-local, highly-visual ClearlyLethbridge.com web site. Whether youâre a local looking for a restaurant or an out-of-town visitor searching for a hotel, you'll find the best area restaurants, entertainment, shopping, auto repair, catering, salons, services and more. Listings are updated directly by the business owners, so you can count on accurate, up-to-date info. New Lethbridge jobs, events, coupons and specials are updated daily.FEATURES- Detailed Business Information- Coupons- Photos- Local Event Calendars- Local Business Search- Updated by Business Owners
